oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Donald Mcpherson interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McPherson, Donald; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McPherson, Donald; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Donald McPherson served in the U.S. Army during the Vietnam War from June 1969 through June 1970. The interview was conducted by Ed Caudill on July 25, 2019 at the Blount County Public Library.
